Chapter Previous

class gstTorus : public gstShape

Torus primitive. This represents the geometry of a torus. The default position and orientation is centered about the origin with the ring radius (Major Radius) set to 2/3 and the swept circle radius (Minor Radius) set to 1/3. The y-axis passes through the hole of the Torus.

From header file: gstTorus.h
